ARTICLE# 2 ON: [“VATSYAYNA KE KAMA SUTRAS”…. The love making art during very very personal moments....A supreme literature work on KAMA KALA(Sex making art)]:
Article By Madan M Pandey

>>“VATSYAYNA KE KAMA SUTRAS”:
Say….Love making formula in very....very personal moments…….The love making art during very very personal moments……The one and only….The love making art by Maharashi Vatsyayana…Supreme an unparrel work in human history…thousands of year ago in INDIA.

>THE ONE AND ONLY..... AN AUTHENTIC AND SCIENTIFIC WORK ON THE KAMA (SEX).....THE KAMA SUTRAS.....KNOWN AS "VATSYAYANA KE KAMA SUTRAS " in English it can be said….  SEX MAKING ART OF VATSYAYANA

>>IMPORTANCE OF OF KAMASUTRA:
Despite having enthusiasm determination, faith and capacity, often a human being fails to achieve his object for the want of a competent guide. Kama or carnal pleasure is one of the main objects of existence of a human being. But without a well-laid discourse and discipline, no one can achieve pleasure. Like other disciplines, Kama Shastra….. also contains certain norms and disciplined actions necessary to achieve one`s goal.

Thanks and best regards with best wishes for good sexual health and condition…trusting to have been of services to you I remain…..

Sincerely Yours,
Madan M Pandey (Ayurveda activist, freelance herbalist and research scholar on fundamentals of Ayurveda and rare remedies)
